mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_stock (ps_num, pro_id) SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTRING(ps_num, 1, 2), LPAD(max(ps_id) + 1, 6, '0')), #{maxProId} FROM product_stock WHERE ps_num LIKE CONCAT('%', 'PS', '%')
